attributes.action: STOP Russia,Iran& USA sending nuclear weapons/artillery to the Syrian President.
attributes.additional_details:
Delegated by Kutaiba:
"My country in hell and the people who help us are the people who also make first judgement that we are stealing their jobs and have some relation with ISIS. A Syrian has no relation with ISISn we just want to be frre from the President, using President Barack Obama's, Vladmir Putin's and Hassain Rouhani's weapons against us. You have the power to fix my war".
attributes.background: The Syrian conflict is between the ruling power of Shia muslims, who, as soon as Sunni Muslims (the rest of the country) wanted a different government, started killing them.Iran,Russia and the USA are sending weapons for the minortity group, Shias, who are brutually murdering Syrians, forced to flee

rejection.details:
The UK Government can't control the actions of the governments of other countries. 

You could start a petition asking for the UK Government to urge other governments to take, or not take, a particular action.
